mapper.update: update T_MYONE set income=#{income}, incomeDate=#{incomeDate} where accountNo=#{accountNo}
mapper.insert: insert into T_FIXED_COST(accountNo, pocketCode, fixedName, fixedCost) values(#{accountNo}, 2, #{fixedName}, #{fixedCost})
mapper.select: select * from T_FIXED_COST where accountNo=#{accountNo} and fixedName=#{fixedName}
select accountNo, sum(fixedCost) as fixedSum from T_FIXED_COST group by accountNo having accountNo=#{accountNo}

select a.autoDivAmount, a.autoDivDate, b.pocketName, a.fromPocket, a.toPocket from T_AUTO_DIVIDE a, (select pocketName from T_MYONE_POCKET where pocketCode = #{pocketCode} and accountNo=#{accountNo}) b where a.autoDivAmount =#{divAmount} and autoDivDate = #{autoDivDate} and a.fromPocket='기본'
mapper.update: update T_MYONE set parkingLimit=#{parkingGoal} where accountNo=#{accountNo}
mapper.select: select parkingLimit from T_MYONE where accountNo=#{accountNo}
